p : Path u' v
e : v ⟶ w'
⊢ cast (_ : u' = u') (_ : w' = w') (cons p e) =
    cons (cast (_ : u' = u') (_ : v = v) p) (Hom.cast (_ : v = v) (_ : w' = w') e)
